title: @Riot
body:
Rito plz make a hide and seek game mode and a map to go with it. Its something fun and gives summoners a chance to have a bit of fun with some friends. As some people already know you can play hide and seek on the Crystal Scar but the map just isn't big enough and doesn't have enough hiding spots for a real fun and tense game of hide and seek.

I love to see that Riot are still trying to make new game modes like the new “Black Market Brawlers” which is soon to hit the PBE so keep up the good work Riot <3.

Have a nice day, Happy Meming. ٩(͡๏̯͡๏)۶

replies.body: i agree i played my 1st one two days ago its just a good, stress free way to chill out and have fun.
